publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 61
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa čozmaḥ üśt́uńa miźmor David́ǵa. Tynlaɣyn e Teńri sÁarnamaɣymny qulaḥ salɣyn tefilamny.
Učundan ol jerniń saja čaɣyramyn b́ukrajǵańd́a juragim qajaɣa öźumd́ań bijikŕak ḱońd́argiń ḿeni.
Ki bolduj syjynč maja kip v́eza kibik alnyndan dušmannyn.

Tirilajim čatyrlaryjda dunjaɣa
dejiń syjynajym hašɣaḥajnyn hamḿeš́a.
Ki śeń Teńri eši- t́asiń nijet́ĺarimni b́erdij ḿeŕaš́lik qorḥuvčularɣa šemijd́ań.
Ḱuńĺar ḱuńĺari üśt́uńa Bijniń arttyrasyn jyllaryn anyn dor- dan dorɣa dejiń.
Oltursun dunjaɣa dejiń alnynda Teńriniń ševa- ɣat da kertilik symarlaɣyn ki abragejlar any.
Kertid́ań zemer oḥur- myn šemija dunjaɣa dejiń t́oĺaḿa nijat́ĺarimni har ḱuń.
